main event: Four mysterious projectiles, possibly rocket or jet-propelled, landed in the U.S. zone of Germany between October 1946 and January 31, 1949.
interesting points: The projectiles were reported to have uncanny accuracy, landing all in a small area near Schweinfurt,The fourth projectile was seen by a German policeman who described its flaming tail as it streaked through the sky before hitting the ground,The impact created a hole seven feet wide and ten inches deep,The first missile was reported by German police in October 1946 with two others following in May and July 1947, Investigative efforts regarding the incidents have been minimal and no physical evidence has been reconstructed.
witness description: A German policeman who witnessed the last projectile's descent.
